# 线性代数的几何意义--图解线性代数

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu
xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu
xianxingdaishu-de-jihe-yiyi-tujie-xianxingdaishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
